msg: ACCUMULO-2467 updated manuals and examples for 1.4 and 1.5

author: oheger
msg: This is a special NodeModel implementation which operates on a tracked node.
It will be used for the new implementation of sub node configurations.

author: oheger
msg: Added a replaceTrackedNode() method to InMemoryNodeModel.
This method is useful when working on sub trees of the model. It is then
possible to detach a whole sub tree and to replace its root node.
